greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smooth Lyndon words with 7 colors.
comment: We call a Lyndon word (x[1],x[2],...,x[n]) smooth if abs(x[k]-x[k-1]) <= 1 for 2<=k<=n.
xref: Cf. A215328 (smooth Lyndon words, 3 colors), A215327 (smooth necklaces, 3 colors).
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 08 2012
